name: General Knowledge Assistant
description: Handles general knowledge questions, explanations, and conversations that don't require specialized educational tools. Use for: explaining concepts, answering 'what is' questions, general chat, and topics outside the learning system's specialized functions.

name: Quiz Generation Specialist
description: ONLY use for creating, generating, or making quizzes, tests, or practice questions. Specializes in: generating MCQs, true/false, short answer questions with specified difficulty levels and topics. Use when user wants to CREATE or GENERATE quiz questions, NOT for finding existing questions or predicting exam content.

name: Assignment Helper & Task Breakdown Specialist
description: ONLY use when students need help UNDERSTANDING, BREAKING DOWN, or getting GUIDANCE on homework or assignments. Provides: task decomposition, resource suggestions, progress guidance, and assignment understanding. Use for: 'help with assignment', 'break down task', 'guide me through homework', NOT for quiz generation or checking plagiarism.

name: Plagiarism Checker & Text Originality Improver
description: ONLY use for CHECKING text for plagiarism or REPHRASING content to improve originality. Specializes in: detecting copied content, comparing against databases, rephrasing while preserving meaning, generating plagiarism scores. Use for: 'check plagiarism', 'is this copied', 'rephrase', 'improve originality', 'paraphrase', NOT for general writing help.

name: Academic Research Paper Finder
description: ONLY use for FINDING, SEARCHING, or LOCATING research papers, academic articles, journals, or case studies. Specializes in: searching academic databases, summarizing papers, finding recent publications. Use for: 'find papers', 'search articles', 'research on topic', 'literature review', 'case studies', NOT for creating citations or checking plagiarism.

name: Practice & Weak Topic Reinforcement Specialist
description: ONLY use when students are STRUGGLING with specific topics and need MORE PRACTICE or REINFORCEMENT. Generates: flashcards, practice exercises, mini-tasks for weak areas. Use for: 'struggling with', 'need practice', 'weak in', 'reinforce', 'flashcards', NOT for initial learning or quiz generation.

name: Citation & Bibliography Generator
description: ONLY use for CREATING, GENERATING, or FORMATTING academic citations and bibliographies. Specializes in: APA, MLA, Chicago, Harvard styles. Use for: 'cite', 'citation', 'reference', 'bibliography', 'format reference', NOT for finding papers or checking plagiarism.

name: Team Collaboration Analyzer
description: ONLY use for ANALYZING team discussions, group work, or collaboration patterns. Monitors: participation balance, communication quality, contribution levels. Use for: 'team discussion', 'group work', 'collaboration analysis', 'who is contributing', 'team feedback', NOT for individual assignments or learning.

name: Adaptive Flashcard Creator
description: ONLY use for specifically creating FLASHCARDS for memorization and recall. Generates: adaptive flashcards based on performance, spaced repetition cards. Use for: 'create flashcards', 'flashcards for', 'study cards', 'memorize', NOT for general practice or quizzes.

name: Presentation & Speech Analyzer
description: ONLY use for ANALYZING presentations, speeches, or talk transcripts. Provides: delivery feedback, confidence analysis, pacing review, material quality assessment. Use for: 'presentation feedback', 'analyze my speech', 'review my presentation', NOT for creating presentations or general writing feedback.

name: Lecture Audio Analyzer & Note Generator
description: ONLY use for ANALYZING lecture recordings, class audio, or generating notes from lectures. Processes: audio transcription, key insight extraction, lecture summaries. Use for: 'analyze lecture', 'lecture recording', 'lecture notes', 'class audio', NOT for general note-taking or text summarization.

name: Exam Question Predictor
description: ONLY use for PREDICTING or ANTICIPATING likely exam questions based on syllabus and past papers. Analyzes: historical patterns, topic frequency, question trends. Use for: 'predict exam questions', 'what might come in exam', 'likely questions', 'analyze past papers', NOT for creating quizzes or practice questions.

name: Daily Study Habit Tracker
description: ONLY use for TRACKING daily study habits, setting study reminders, or monitoring revision progress over time. Provides: progress tracking, study reminders, habit monitoring, routine suggestions. Use for: 'track my study', 'study reminders', 'monitor progress', 'daily revision', NOT for creating schedules or timetables.

name: Study Timetable & Schedule Creator
description: ONLY use for CREATING or GENERATING study timetables, schedules, or time management plans. Creates: personalized timetables, study schedules based on deadlines and subjects. Use for: 'create schedule', 'make timetable', 'study plan', 'organize time', NOT for tracking habits or setting reminders.

name: Exam Preparation Assessment Specialist
description: ONLY use for ASSESSING exam readiness, creating mock exams, or evaluating preparation levels. Generates: comprehensive assessments, mock tests, readiness scores. Use for: 'am I ready', 'assess preparation', 'mock exam', 'readiness check', NOT for creating practice quizzes or predicting questions.
